text: Thoothukudi First Additional and Sessions Judge Ravindran on Wednesday sentenced a man to undergo life imprisonment. According to prosecution, V. Manikandan (37) of Achankulam was found guilty of murdering S. Shanmugavel (52) of the same area on June 12, 2011 over a dispute concerning sewage flowing near his house. Pasuvanthanai police had registered a case. He was sentenced under Section 302 of IPC and a fine of Rs. 5,000 imposed on him.
title: Man sentenced to life for murder
